titleStmt.title: At the sign of the windmill in Jewen-Street, near unto Alders-Gate-Street, lives an approved physician, who (by God's blessing) infallibly cures. viz. the running of the reins, known by an issue from the yard, and scalding pain in making water (not always got by foul women, as some think) ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
